mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.article_id AS "article.id", aa.title AS "article.title", aa.url AS "article.url", a.broker_id AS "broker.id", bb.nickname AS "broker.nickname", a.openid AS "openid", a.read_count AS "readCount", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", uu.name AS "updateBy.name", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN sys_user uu ON uu.id = a.update_by LEFT JOIN mod_broker bb ON bb.id = a.broker_id LEFT JOIN wx_article aa ON aa.id = a.article_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wx_reads( id, article_id, broker_id, openid, read_count, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{article.id}, #{broker.id}, #{openid}, #{readCount}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE wx_reads SET article_id = #{article.id}, broker_id = #{broker.id}, openid = #{openid}, read_count = #{readCount}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
